about_the_game:
Step into the world of this meme-infused nightclub!

Immerse yourself in a variety of roles and unleash your creativity using our provided tools or choose from those crafted by all players.
Creating characters here is incredibly simple, no need for time-consuming modeling. Simply upload an image and watch your character come to life instantly. If you can draw on your own, then you could play as your OC! Go ahead and embody your favorite character!
Discover countless new friends who, like you, will engage with you in the most unique and captivating ways. Throw an unforgettable fan party with your fellows!

This lightweight online game will be available on PC, iOS, and Android platforms, ensuring you can seamlessly dive into the game and stay connected with your friends, no matter where you are.

Currently under development, this game will utilize AI technology in the future to reduce the cost of creating characters and enhance their expressiveness. Additionally, we will gradually introduce entertaining party gameplay to ensure you and your favorite characters have a delightful time here!

Immerse yourself in a variety of roles and unleash your creativity using our provided tools or choose from those crafted by all players.
Creating characters here is incredibly simple, no need for time-consuming modeling. Simply upload an image and watch your character come to life instantly. If you can draw on your own, then you could play as your OC! Go ahead and embody your favorite character!
Discover countless new friends who, like you, will engage with you in the most unique and captivating ways. Throw an unforgettable fan party with your fellows!

This lightweight online game will be available on PC, iOS, and Android platforms, ensuring you can seamlessly dive into the game and stay connected with your friends, no matter where you are.

Currently under development, this game will utilize AI technology in the future to reduce the cost of creating characters and enhance their expressiveness. Additionally, we will gradually introduce entertaining party gameplay to ensure you and your favorite characters have a delightful time here!
name: WoofChat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 660 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Unleash your creativity in a customizable online nightclub. Be anyone, chat with other captivating players. Play on PC, iOS, Android—anywhere, anytime!
